pages.text: $(bgreen)Garlic$() carries an advanced Doctorate in Redirection from the Brussels University. He'll talk all day about lane vectors and repulse arrays. Somehow his wife puts up with it.$(br)$(byellow)Sun Cost$() : $(l)50$()$(br)$(bblue)Recharge$() : $(l)Normal$()$(br)$(l)Features$() : It is a $(l)defender$() plant that has high health, and it can $(bred)attract enemies to attack itself$() in 5 * 5 range.
$(bpurple)Special :$() who ate it will be $(bred)diverted to attack another nearest garlic$() in 10 blocks.$(br)$(bgreen)Plant Food :$() Not Available.
